Package elements

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • elements.User
  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps the properties of users who are using the program as senders and receivers. All users have to have an inbox an outbox a unique id and friends to communicate. Users have the ability to send message and add or remove friends.
    Author:
    Salim Kemal Tirit

      • User

        public User​(int id)
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • addFriend

        public void addFriend​(User other)
        Adds a new friend to friends list of user and also makes the other user friends with this user.
        Parameters:
        other - if the friend to be added

      • removeFriend

        public void removeFriend​(User other)
        Removes two users from each others friends list.
        Parameters:
        other - is the friend to be removed (or should i say ex-friend)

      • isFriendsWith

        public boolean isFriendsWith​(User other)
        Parameters:
        other - is the user to check if they are friends with this one.
        Returns:
        true if two users are friends, false if they are not.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(User receiver,
                        java.lang.String body,
                        int time,
                        elements.Server server)
        Creates and sends a message.
        Parameters:
        receiver - is the user who will (hopefully) receive message
        body - is the readable part of message
        time - is the sending time of message
        server - is Server
        See Also:
        Outbox.add(Message), Server.add(Message)

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns:
